i1.blurb: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.
description:
{{sbc|Martial Poise:}} '''Kalista's''' [[basic attack]]s have special interactions:
* Use only {{as|90% attack damage}}.
* Miss if she loses {{tip|sight}} of her target before they hit.
* Cannot cancel their wind-up, but can select a new target within range.
* Make her {{tip|dash|lunge}} in the target direction after issuing a movement command during a wind-up or right after casting {{ai|Pierce|Kalista}}. The lunge distance scales with her boots tier.

The wind-up while dashing is only reduced by {{fd|0.66}}% per {{sti|{{as|1% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} compared to the standard 1% per 1%.

Additionally, '''Kalista''' begins the game with {{ii|The Black Spear}}, a unique item.
i1.name: Martial Poise
notes: * ''The Black Spear'' can not be used on [[Champion summoned units|decoys]]. Targeting those will put the item on a 10 seconds cooldown.
* The dash speed is affected by movement speed modifiers and so it will be reduced by {{tip|Slow}}.
* {{Pending for test}}: Dash range values using {{ai|Pierce|Kalista}}.

q1.blurb: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kalista''' hurls a fast and narrow spear, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to the first enemy hit.

If ''Pierce'' kills its target, the spear continues onward, transferring all of the dead victim's {{ai|Rend|Kalista}} stacks to the next enemy it hits. This can repeat indefinitely until the spear reaches its maximum distance.
q1.name: Pierce

w1.blurb: Passively gain Attack Speed when near her Oathsworn ally, and deal bonus damage when striking the same target. Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.
description: {{sbc|Passive - Soul-Marked:}} While '''Kalista''' and her {{ii|The Black Spear|Oathsworn}} are linked, their basic attacks<!-- and Kalista's Pierce, please check in-game Kalista Q description--> apply a ''Soul-Mark'' to their targets.

If both ''Soul-Marks'' are applied within 2 seconds, the target takes {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}} (capped against non-champions), and cannot be ''Soul-Marked'' for 10 seconds. ''Soul-Mark'' deals 75 minimum damage to {{tip|minions}} and executes them if they're below {{as|{{sti|health|125 health}}}}.
'''Kalista''' stores a charge of ''Sentinel'' periodically, up to a maximum of 2 stored at once.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Kalista''' summons a ''Sentinel'' by her side to {{tip|sight|scout}} {{tt|the target area|5000 range}}.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|5 to 15}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}}|Maximum Non-Champion Damage|{{ap|100 to 200}}}}
w1.name: Sentinel
notes: <!-- If pierce kills the target by soul-marked added damage, will it continue? -->
* ''Soul-Marked'' displays a mark above the target hit by ''Kalista'' or her {{ii|The Black Spear|Oathsworn}} ally's basic attacks.
** This mark resembles half a spearhead and, if either attacks the target after the other has done so, the spearhead will assemble itself and ''Soul-Marked's'' bonus damage will trigger.
* ''Soul-Marked's'' bonus damage is credited to ''Kalista'' and will benefit from both her [[magic penetration]] and her [[spell effects]].

** If her {{ii|The Black Spear|Oathsworn}} ally scores a kill using ''Soul-Marked's'' bonus damage they will get a message stating 'Kill Secured' in place of the usual gold pop-up (the gold itself is credited to ''Kalista'').
* The ''Sentinel's'' vision grants assists and/or kills (if the spotted enemy champion dies shortly after being so).

e1.blurb: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kalista's''' basic attacks and {{ai|Pierce|Kalista}} each lodge a spear in her target, stacking up to 254 times. The stack of spears remains for 4 seconds while untouched.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Kalista''' rips all lodged spears from nearby enemies, dealing {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds, with spears beyond the first dealing reduced damage. ''Rend'' deals 50% reduced damage to epic [[monster]]s.
''Rend'' resets its {{sti|cooldown}} and refunds {{sti|{{as|mana}}}} if it kills at least one target.
leveling:
{{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 60}} {{as|(+ 60% AD)}}|Damage per Additional Spear|{{pp|5|notooltip=true|10+3*(x-1)+x*(x-1)/2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|60*0.33|60*0.3958 to 60*0.5833 4}}% AD)}}}}
{{st|Slow|{{ap|25 to 45}}%}}
e1.name: Rend
notes: * The cooldown will reset if the target dies but has a revival effect (e.g. {{cai|Chronoshift|Zilean}}).
* {{sbc|Possible Bug:}} If ''Rend'' is used against a {{ci|Sion}} under the effects of {{ai|Glory in Death|Sion}}, the cooldown will reset even if it doesn't kill the {{ci|Sion}}.

r1.blurb: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to Launch toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kalista''' invokes her {{ii|The Black Spear|link}}, retrieving her ''Oathsworn'' and placing them in {{tip|stasis}} for 4 seconds.

'''Kalista's''' ''Oathsworn'' can emerge to a target location, stopping at the first enemy hit, {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} all surrounding enemies and landing themselves at their basic attack range relative to the target hit.
r1.name: Fate's Call
notes: * ''Fate's Call'' will wait for the ''Oathsworn'' ally to finish their channels before holding them.
* The ''Oathsworn'' ally is {{tip|untargetable}} and {{tip|invisibility|invisible}} so long as they remain held by ''Fate's Call'', represented by a light over ''Kalista's'' head until they dash.
